snippet.title: Lies of P - Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Play the Lies of P demo and preorder now! Lies of P will be available on September 19, 2023 worldwide on PS4. PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam and physically at participating retailers. 
https://www.liesofp.com/en-us/demo/

Take a deep dive into the diverse gameplay mechanics in the upcoming action RPG from NEOWIZ and get ready to lie or die. This video covers creating unique weapon combinations, unlocking special skills, unleashing devastating Fable Arts, and more in Lies of P. 
https://www.liesofp.com/en-us/#lopPreorder

Timestamps below
0:00 Introduction
1:26 Bell Epoque
1:40 Characters
2:05 Weapon assemble
2:42 Weapon upgrade
2:55 Weapon durability
3:17 Fable Arts
3:37 Groggy
3:55 Fatal Attack
4:09 Guard
4:49 Legion Arm
5:05 Monsters
5:25 Bosses
6:02  P-Organ
6:27 Costumes
6:54 Soundtrack
7:27 Riddles
7:37 Lies
7:56 Release date
8:06 Demo and Pre-Order
8:18 Details
8:37 Actual Demo footage

Fans interested in learning more can follow the game on Twitter, Facebook, and Steam or join the community on the official Discord server.
Web: https://www.liesofp.com/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/16...
Playstation: https://www.playstation.com/games/lie...
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/games/lies-of-p
Discord: https://discord.gg/TfKV3ReZjr
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Liesofp
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/liesofp_off...
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LiesofP

#liesofp  #rpg #soulslike #neowiz #steamgames #console #pinnochio
